name: Barbeque with Friends
description:
⭐Control: WASD to move, SPACE to interact ⭐

🍉A game about spending time with friends on a peaceful afternoon.

This is my entry for 'my first game jam: summer 2021' !! The theme is 'Free'. I want to loosely base this theme on the idea of free activities and things that you could do without spending too much money, which includes spending time outdoors and having wholesome moments with friends! 

It's my first game jam and it's made with Unity and Blender. I would like to take it further and add more elements to it when I got more time!
